title: Kubernetes Cluster Overview Dashboard
description:
The Datadog Kubernetes dashboard gives you broad visibility into the scale, status, and resource usage of your cluster and its containers. Further reading for Kubernetes monitoring:

- [Autoscale Kubernetes workloads with any Datadog metric](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/autoscale-kubernetes-datadog/)

- [How to monitor Kubernetes + Docker with Datadog](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/monitor-kubernetes-docker/)

- [Monitoring in the Kubernetes era](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/monitoring-kubernetes-era/)

- [Monitoring Kubernetes performance metrics](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/monitoring-kubernetes-performance-metrics/)

- [Collecting metrics with built-in Kubernetes monitoring tools](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/how-to-collect-and-graph-kubernetes-metrics/)

- [Monitoring Kubernetes with Datadog](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/monitoring-kubernetes-with-datadog/)

- [Datadog's Kubernetes integration docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/kubernetes/)

Check [the agent documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/agent/kubernetes/) if some of the graphs are empty.
Clone this template dashboard to make changes and add your own graph widgets.

definition.content:
### The Datadog Kubernetes dashboard gives you broad visibility into the scale, status, and resource usage of your cluster and its containers.

Further reading for Kubernetes monitoring

- [Autoscale Kubernetes workloads with any Datadog metric](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/autoscale-kubernetes-datadog/)

- [How to monitor Kubernetes + Docker with Datadog](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/monitor-kubernetes-docker/)

- [Monitoring in the Kubernetes era](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/monitoring-kubernetes-era/)

- [Monitoring Kubernetes performance metrics](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/monitoring-kubernetes-performance-metrics/)

- [Collecting metrics with built-in Kubernetes monitoring tools](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/how-to-collect-and-graph-kubernetes-metrics/)

- [Monitoring Kubernetes with Datadog](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/monitoring-kubernetes-with-datadog/)

- [Datadog's Kubernetes integration docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/kubernetes/)
View more in the [Kubernetes Nodes Overview Dashboard](https://app.datadoghq.com/dash/integration/30340/kubernetes-nodes-overview?tpl_var_cluster=$cluster.value)

Sum Kubernetes memory requests per node

View more in the [Kubernetes Daemonset Overview Dashboard](https://app.datadoghq.com/screen/integration/30537/kubernetes-daemonsets-overview?tpl_var_kube_cluster_name=$cluster.value&tpl_var_scope=$scope.value)
